message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, I am looking to keep my budget within $15000. Would you consider selling the product for $14000?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13200.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. Considering my budget, could you possibly lower the price to $13500?
I understand you're getting close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $13000.
